parameters.doc:
The directory from which to run the command.  If you supply
        this directory but it does not exist, the command will fail.
parameters.name: cwd

parameters.doc:
The file, directory, or list of such which need to be
        (un)archived. If no source is given, it defaults to all files
        under `cwd` for archiving, or all files inside the archive for
        unarchiving.
parameters.name: source

parameters.doc:
A file or directory created by unpacking the archive.  If 
        this file exists on disk, the unarchival will not be performed.
        Note: if unpacking is successful but fails to create this file,
        it will be created anyway. This allows consistent behavior with
        other types using the 'creates' parameter (such as exec).
parameters.name: creates

parameters.doc:
Compression type to use. Typically this will be derived
        automatically from the archive name.  Valid values are `auto`, `compress`, `uncompress`, `gzip`, `gz`, `z`, `gunzip`, `ungzip`, `bzip2`, `lzip`, `lzma`, `lzop`, `xz`.  Values can match `/.+/`.
parameters.name: compression

parameters.doc: Options to pass to the provider.
parameters.name: options
